short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with GPT-4, Claude 3, etc., generate summaries of any webpage within 10 sec, use AI to translate & explain words and sentences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aili is an ALL-in-one cross-platform AI copilot with the following main features:

💬 Chat
Can freely choose AI models for conversation: GPT-4, Claud 3 Opus,  Claud 3 Sonnet, 
Mistral Large, Mistral 8x7B, Llama 2 70B,  Claude 2, GPT-3.5, Claud 3 Haiku, Claude Instant and Gemini 1.5 Pro.

⚡Summarize
Generate a one-click summary of any webpage and continue the conversation about the webpage. When generating the summary, you can freely choose: general, Q&A, and story types.

🌐 Translate
Translate words, sentences, paragraphs, and can use AI to explain or rewrite. Supported languages include: English, 简体中文, 繁体中文, Français, Italian, Русский, Português, العربية, 日本語, 한국인, Deutsch, ไทย, Tiếng Việt, Türkçe and Indonesia.

🗂️ Document Library
Unlimited document library, saving every webpage you've generated a summary or conversed with.

📱 Cross-platform
Support Chrome extension, Web client, iOS & Android clients.

🎁 Free to use
Free users can use standard models like GPT-3.5, Claud 3 Haiku, Claude Instant and Gemini 1.5 Pro (20 requests per day), and unlimited translation request.

🩷 Simple and Easy
We pursue product details and strive for simplicity in our products.
